_sText:
This pack consists of 3 different versions of my most recent FySeb_Italia map. 

The pack contains an updated version of fyseb_italia that SHOULD 
(I don't know, cause I don't have any friends to test with) fix problems with getting stuck when two people 
go through the same spawn door shortly after each other. 

A few more tweaks have been made as well, such as placing nodraw brushes in places unseen to hopefully improve
map performance.

This release also contains a AFK solution, thanks to Fox154. 
After 60 seconds of the round, anyone left in the spawnzone will be teleported.

---
Fight Yard - 
This is the same map that I have been working on for about a week now. 
Depending on the door you choose, you will be spawned with certian weaponry.

GunGame - Deathmatch - 
This version lacks the whole "Your door = your weapons" thing I had going, but has no buyzone. 
Best used in conjunction with the Mattie EventScript GUNGAME, and the SourceMod plug-in, CSSDM.

Vanilla CSS - 
This version is the same as above, just with a buyzone in the spawn.\
